div.p: Encounter Diagnoses: a specific code indicating type of service provided: SNOMED CT, ICD-10-AM, or CPT

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://snomed.info/sct

Include all codes defined in http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt
